name: Tiny Pirate Captain
description:
Made for GMC Jam 13 where the theme was "Pirates" and the handicap was "Must be 2D".

Take control of a teeny weeny pirate captain trapped on a little desert island. There's treasure everywhere but there's a catch - undead skeleton pirates want to keep it all for themselves!

Survive as long as you can collecting treasure and defeating the skeletons.
